question: Hi - I never see Systemic Sclerosis or even Scleroderma on here.  Wondering if there are any people on this site who have been diagnosed with it though.  I've had it for years, but also have MS, Diabetes, Hypothyroid, Sjogrens, and many other diseases.  I'm just looking for others with the complications that come with SSc.  Thanks.
title: Anyone on here have Systemic Sclerosis?
